sentences.en: A nautical almanac gives information about the sun, moon, tides, etc.
sentences.cn: 航海年历中有日 、 月 、 潮汐等的资料.

sentences.en: Data bulk of new edition almanac is greater, content is richer, use more convenient.
sentences.cn: 新版年鉴数据量更大, 内容更丰富, 使用更方便.

sentences.en: He would resume pacing the courtyard and reading the almanac.
sentences.cn: 于是他又捧了那本历书,在廊下徘徊起来.

sentences.en: I found many subjects of theatre in almanac.
sentences.cn: 我在年鉴中找到了许多戏剧方面的资料.

sentences.en: I'll wager it is not in the almanac.
Joe sent away for a free almanac.
sentences.cn: 乔写信去要一份免费赠阅的年历.

sentences.en: Mastering a trade, perfecting our human craft - self - sustainment is achieved as we author our own almanac.
sentences.cn: 贸易管理, 对工艺精益求精-发明历史的同时,我们可以得到自我支撑.

sentences.en: One was a sacred almanac of 0 days.
sentences.cn: 一种是每年0天的神圣年鉴.

sentences.en: One was a sacred almanac of 260 days.
sentences.cn: 一种是每年260天的神圣年鉴.

sentences.en: Source: Almanac of China's Finance and Banking and the People's Bank of China.
sentences.cn: 资料来源: 《中国金融年鉴》及中国人民银行.

sentences.en: The almanac says that today is a suitable day for going out.
sentences.cn: 通书上说今天是个吉日,宜出行.

sentences.en: The almanac skin has the handbag factory for the domestic soleownership handbag manufacture enterprise.
sentences.cn: 通胜皮具手袋制造厂为国内独资手袋制造企业.

sentences.en: The Chronicle Almanac shows that new assistant professors in foreign language earned 48,000 dollars last year.
sentences.cn: 编年史年鉴显示,去年新的外语助理教授的收入为四万八千美元.

sentences.en: We looked in the almanac published by the Chronicle of Higher Education.
sentences.cn: 我们在高等教育编年史出版的年鉴中寻找答案.

sentences.en: ZIP - latest hefty almanac algorithm, the newly hefty almanac weeks - algorithm C implementation ( hot power ).
sentences.cn: 最新的万年历算法, 新编万年历星期速算法C语言的实现 ( hotpower ).

phrases.tran_cn: n. 航海天文历，航海历

trans.tran_cn: 历书， 年历， 黄历，年鉴
trans.tran_en: a book produced each year containing information about a particular subject, especially a sport, or important dates, times etc
